evidence.claim: Techstars Healthcare Accelerator partners leverage AWS for cloud infrastructure.
The accelerator supports companies focusing on HIPAA-compliant health solutions.
Techstars emphasizes API integrations for efficient healthcare data management.
Mentors include experts in FHIR and HL7 data standards for healthcare applications.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of direct engagement in the X12 or clearinghouse processes.
